/* FireFacMap.SelectFireFacList 소방시설 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
A.SUP_HIT = #SUP_HIT#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.IST_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.IST_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.MOF_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250019' AND DTL_CD = A.MOF_CDE ) AS MOF_NAM , A.FIR_DIP , A.PIP_DIP , A.SUP_HIT , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
A.SUP_HIT = #SUP_HIT#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* FireFacMap.SelectFireFacDtl 소방시설 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.IST_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.IST_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.MOF_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250019' AND DTL_CD = A.MOF_CDE ) AS MOF_NAM , A.FIR_DIP , A.PIP_DIP , A.SUP_HIT , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM , A.ANG_DIR FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , HOM_NUM , MOF_CDE , FIR_DIP , PIP_DIP , SUP_HIT , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , decode(length(#IST_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , #HOM_NUM# , #MOF_CDE# , #FIR_DIP# , #PIP_DIP# , #SUP_HIT# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )

/* 소방시설 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = decode(length(#IST_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM# , MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE# , FIR_DIP = #FIR_DIP# , PIP_DIP = #PIP_DIP# , SUP_HIT = #SUP_HIT# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
/* 소방시설 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
